title: Rikafip
author: Rikafip
content: What happened; user @Hallantroe created the thread in which he gives advice how to avoid being scamemd, while the real purpose of that thread is to promote crypto recovery service. At first, nothing weird there (beside the fact that all those recover services are fake), but when you check their website you will see plenty of red flags; from claim of having 100% recovery rate, to fake team member photos and phonmy testimonials. Since this is obviously fake service, I am creating this thread in order to flag the before mentioned user.User Hallantroe Thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5406011.msg60555716#msg60555716Archive https://ninjastic.space/topic/5406011Website https://web.archive.org/web/20220712152536/https://www.prudentrecovery.com/Flag Type 1 https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;flag=3004Their whole team is fake, but as proof I am just going to share one of them, which should be enough to show that this is nothing but a scam, trying to profit from desperate people who already lost money.

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: When a company is posting something like this:QuoteCrypto Recovery [ bitcoin, etherum, BNB, litecoin] ; with the high level of investment and investors running into the crypto world, we said it earlier that alot have made the wrong investments, such as falling into fake brokers, beings ripped off or scammed online. As a registered institution we have access to data network that can be used to trace crypto transactions,and not just trace but interface that gives access to recovery channels of cryptocurrency, therefore we have recorded high rate of positive feedback in helping people and conduct an end-to-end investigation and asset recovery of any particular case for who have fallen victim to one scam or the other to recover their cryptocurrencies, What illiterate monkey has written this shit?!Want to look for a fake or run by stupid idiots company, check if they know how to fuckin spell Ethereum!!!QuotePrivate InvestigationDue to the nature of theses countries some regulatory bodies can be, at best, titular and in the worst cases non-existent.Wire RecallDue to the nature of theses countries some regulatory bodies can be, at best, titular and in the worst cases non-existent.Quote Cryptocurrency options and forex were created in Israel, and has since became a multi billion pound industry.QuoteWe are a British company working in the county of Dorset ....Reach Our Location: NEWPORTSeriously, I can't stop laughing at those, but probably a British person would be really pissed!We're headquartered in the Golden State, California, reach our location in St. Louis For a while, those recovery scammers seemed to be going extinct but I guess the wave of bankruptcy has given them a new push to try it again.Oh, and talking about reviewsWhat "cryptocurrency expert" would leave his picture and full name for everyone on the internet to know how he was scammed and he lost his funds?

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: dkbit98 on July 12, 2022, 08:35:39 PMClaiming to have 23092 Happy Customers, with 6287378 recovered funds and 13432 coins, is just random number on screen and nothing else.Yep, everywhere you look you stumble upon a red flag, I just mentioned few as it was enough to show what's really going on there.Quote from: stompix on July 14, 2022, 05:16:43 PMFor a while, those recovery scammers seemed to be going extinct but I guess the wave of bankruptcy has given them a new push to try it again.I wouldn't be surprised if they start using Celsius angle, promising people that they can somehow get the money back.Even though this scam attempt look pathetic, I am pretty sure that some will fall for this as people do stupid things when they are desperate, and that's exactly their target audience. After all, more often than not scammer than person he manages to scam, its just that they have will to do it.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Supported flags. When we can't trust any online reviews due to manipulation then how we may trust on-site testimonials? I won't trust any new recovery service that hasn't been proven yet. Because it's a piece of sensitive information. We may lose our funds forever if credentials are handover to the wrong hands. Thanks for the warning and flags.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: I supported flag, how heartless can scammers be?, even to the point of trying to scam already scam victims.How is it even possible to recover lost Bitcoins from scammers when we all know that Bitcoin (and cryptocurrencies in general) transactions are irreversible, I think common sense should tell any one who read the thread that information provided about how to recovered stolen Bitcoins is a scam attempt, for if all he claimed in his post was possible, the platform that fecilitate this would have been very popular due to the numerous number of investors that would want to use their service to recover their stolen assets.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Of all the scam projects I hate Crypto recovery services the most because they victimize the victim, they are putting salt to the victim's wound and this really hurts them, all Crypto recovery sites are scams they are just giving false hope to people that they can recover their account, there is no charge back in Crypto once sent to anonymous people its not possible for a chargeback.

comments.author: Text
comments.body: Not only that and many others are scattered. The only victims may be those who do not have or lack the knowledge of how this type of technology and system works, especially those who immediately believe that they have not even researched whether the recovery service offered is true and possible. Instead of recovering, the rest will be lost or the other wallet/account will be affected. But those soaked in this forum know that at first glance this is a scam.
